SELECT a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids FROM sys_area a WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} ORDER BY a.code limit 10000
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_area( parent_id, parent_ids, code, name, full_name, sort, type, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{code}, #{name}, #{fullName}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_area SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, full_name = #{fullName}, sort = #{sort}, type = #{type}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_area SET del_flag = 1 WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' '%,'+#{id}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
